mapper.select: SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.personal.resume.model.mapper.ResumeMapper#selectAllResumeList() */ A.RESUME_NO , A.IN_MEM_NO , A.RESUME_WRITE_DATE , A.RESUME_SCOUT_STATUS , A.JOB_NO FROM TBL_RESUME A WHERE A.IN_MEM_NO = 3

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.personal.resume.model.mapper.ResumeMapper#selectDetailResumeList() */ R.RESUME_WRITE_DATE , P.POT_KINDS , SII.SELF_INTRO_ITEM_NAME , SIC.SELF_INTRO_ITEM_CONTENT , AH.AWD_NAME , AH.AWD_AGENCY , AH.AWD_DATE , AH.AWD_CONTENT , EH.EDU_NAME , EH.EDU_AGENCY , EH.EDU_START_DATE , EH.EDU_END_DATE , EH.EDU_CONTENT , LH.LICENSE_NAME , LH.LICENSE_AGENCY , LH.LICENSE_DATE , SC.CATEGORY_NAME , SC.CATEGORY_UPPER_NO , S.SKILLS_NAME , CH.CAR_COM_NAME , CH.CAR_HIRE_DATE , CH.CAR_ENT_DATE , CH.CAR_STATUS , CH.CAR_DEPT_NAME , CH.CAR_JOB_NAME , CH.PROJECT_NAME , CH.PROJECT_START_DATE , CH.PROJECT_END_DATE , CH.PROJECT_CONTENT , CH.CAR_WORK_FIELD , JF.JOB_NAME FROM TBL_RESUME R LEFT JOIN TBL_PORTFOLIO P ON (R.RESUME_NO = P.RESUME_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_SELF_INTRODUCTION_CONTENT SIC ON (R.RESUME_NO = SIC.RESUME_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_SELF_INTRODUCTION_ITEM SII ON (SII.SELF_INTRO_ITEM_NO = SIC.SELF_INTRO_ITEM_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_AWARD_HISTORY AH ON (R.RESUME_NO = AH.RESUME_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EDUCATION_HISTORY EH ON (R.RESUME_NO = EH.RESUME_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_LICENSE_HISTORY LH ON (R.RESUME_NO = LH.RESUME_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_RESUME_HOLDING_SKILLS RH ON (R.RESUME_NO = RH.RESUME_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_SKILLS S ON (S.SKILLS_NO = RH.SKILLS_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_SKILLS_CATEGORY SC ON (SC.CATEGORY_NO = S.CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_CAREER_HISTORY CH ON (R.RESUME_NO = CH.RESUME_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_JOB_FIELD JF ON (R.JOB_NO = JF.JOB_NO) WHERE R.RESUME_NO = 1
